alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; North Walton; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 27 at 12:44AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Showers with gusty winds will impact portions of northwestern Bay, Walton, western Holmes and western Washington Counties through 130 AM EST/1230 AM CST/... At 1244 AM EST/1144 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking showers with gusty winds along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Santa Rosa Beach to 13 miles west of Panama City Beach. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City Beach, Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Live Oak, Freeport, Paxton, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Westville, Ebro, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Villa Tasso, Cerrogordo, Gulf Resort Beach, Blue Mountain Beach and Gritney. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; North Walton; South Walton; Washington
